replies.body: SO k1ng Is out for the grand final then?
Thats unfortunate but rules are rules even for the pros. Im a cheifs fan but still Beating the actual legacy roster would be cooler not a subbed adc. {{item:3070}}

did he actually harass his old team? thats low man. if he has acted that way then full right to remove him from the final. good job on riot. good call. as a DW fan it is sad to see K1ng go this way but thats his choice. and now he has to suffer the consequences. good job riot
So Riot is a chiefs fan it seems :P

k1ng is a 17 year old kid right? Perhaps Legacy need some better players management (especially for kiddies with chips on their shoulders). Anyways bring back Minky and Harry for classic LGC! Chiefs will win 3-0 anyways, far better team.
CLG is known for throwing at playoffs, now LGC is known for getting a player banned at playoffs.
No surprises here, watched it play out and all. OCE twitter wars are nothing compared to NA ones though.
Well, just stating my opinion, but flaming SHOULD be allowed. Like, people do bad, they should get told they are bad. And if it really gets to you, then damn, sticks and stones man.
